title: Blended 360
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Fast food, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: A vegetarian take-out/lunch restaurant specializing in healthy smoothies made with only real fruits and vegetables. Made-in-house rice milk is available.  A lot of the menu items are vegan. A grab 'n go section is available with a variety of salads and snacks.
venueHours: Mon 7:00am-3:00pm, Tue 3:00pm-8:00pm, Wed 7:00am-3:00pm, Thu 3:00pm-8:00pm, Fri 7:00am-3:00pm, Sat 10:00am-3:00pm
